item.description:
Now that the holidays are over, let's get together for some outdoor time in our gorgeous quiet corner. This will be a fairly brisk, 1.5 to 2 hour hike over mainly flat ground in the Goodwin Forest area around Pine Acres Pond.

 

We'll start opposite the Goodwin Nature Center/ Museum, leaving the car park no later than 1.00, so please be on time. The hike will take us through a variety of areas, ranging from woods to fields, streams and marsh, then finally down the Rails-to-Trails greenway, The Airline Trail.

 

You'll want to wear hiking boots and bring water/snacks/kleenex et al :) This will be weather dependent -- I will cancel only for rain or deep snow (and if it's deep snow, perhaps we can snowshoe or ski instead.)

 

Please check here on the 14th by 11.00 a.m. for status. You can also call me on my cellphone at 860-634-6541 that morning.

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: Winter Hike in the Goodwin Forest
